Spanning decades, the quest for the missing daggers takes Shiranui through war and ancient tradition.

programme.desc: Frank, a widower with eight children decides to marry his ex-girlfriend Helen, a widow with ten children. However, their eighteen children turn their marriage into complete chaos.

programme.title: Fallen
programme.desc: Detective John Hobbes witnesses the execution of a demonic serial killer, Edgar Reese. However, questions arise when the murders start again, eerily matching the modus operandi of Reese.

programme.title: The Circus
programme.desc: The Tramp is hired by the proprietor of a circus after he stumbles into the middle of a performance and becomes the star attraction. He ends up falling in love with a horse rider.

programme.title: Breaking Up
programme.desc: Monica, a schoolteacher, and Steve, a photographer, have been deeply in love for over two years now. However, their impulsive natures often push their fragile relationship into an on-and-off cycle.

programme.title: Aloha
programme.desc: A celebrated military contractor reconnects with a long-lost love while falling for the air-force officer assigned to him.

programme.title: The Way, Way Back
programme.desc: Duncan, a shy teenager, visits a beach house owned by his mother's boyfriend. Annoyed with everyone, he wanders away to a local water park and meets Owen, who helps him open up to the world.

programme.title: 50 First Dates
programme.desc: Henry falls in love with Lucy, whose short-term memory loss makes her forget him every time she falls asleep. As a result, Henry decides to win her over every day after she wakes up.

programme.desc: After breaking up with Mark, Bridget meets a handsome stranger, Jack. Soon, Bridget finds out that she is pregnant but is unsure about the identity of the father.

programme.title: Jerry Maguire
programme.desc: Sports agent Jerry Maguire tries to get back on his feet after being fired from his job. However, the only client he has is Rod Tidwell, a disgruntled football player who wants a better contract.

programme.title: Peter Rabbit
programme.desc: Peter Rabbit lives in Mr. McGregor's vegetable garden with his three sisters. Their joyful lives are interrupted by the arrival of Thomas, Mr. McGregor's nephew, who wants to drive Peter away.

programme.title: Alvin and the Chipmunks: The Road Chip
programme.desc: Alvin, Simon and Theodore believe that Dave is going to propose to his girlfriend, Samantha, in Miami. In a bid to retain their place in Dave's life, the three set out to stop him.

programme.title: Deck the Halls
programme.desc: When his new neighbour's extravagant Christmas decorations appear, a man feels challenged and initiates a spirited decorating competition.

programme.title: What Happens in Vegas
programme.desc: After a night of wild partying, Jack and Joy, two strangers, awake and find they have married each other. Things get complicated when Jack wins a huge jackpot with Joy's quarter, and they must stay together for six months to get money.

programme.title: Due Date
programme.desc: Peter Highman must reach Los Angeles to make it in time for his child's birth. However, he is forced to travel with Ethan, an aspiring actor, who frequently lands him in trouble.
